meanings.definition: A person who enjoys or appreciates the taste of food or drink.
meanings.sent1: The savorers at the table smiled as they tasted the delicious meal.
meanings.sent2: Food critics are known as savorers for their ability to appreciate different flavors.
meanings.sent3: The savorers at the party couldn't resist going back for seconds of the tasty dessert.
meanings.sent4: Her grandmother was a true savorer, finding joy in every bite she took.
meanings.sent5: The savorers in the restaurant savored each bite as if it were their last.

meanings.definition: Those who take pleasure in or appreciate something.
meanings.sent1: Nature savorers enjoy the beauty of the outdoors and all its wonders.
meanings.sent2: Art savorers find delight in admiring paintings and sculptures.
meanings.sent3: The savorers of good jokes laughed heartily at the comedian's performance.
meanings.sent4: Music savorers can listen to their favorite songs on repeat for hours.
meanings.sent5: Book savorers love getting lost in the pages of a captivating story.
